short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Un-centers the image viewer introduced in Chrome 56.0+

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tiny extension that reverts Chromeâ€™s image viewer back to how it was before Chrome 56: No more stupid black background and centered image.
